page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: I wake up about eight o'clock I go down stairs and get my breakfast,I watch 'Breakfast Time' on TV. Afterwards I go and get dressed, and then go downstairs and help mum with the jobs like tidying and dusting. When I have finished I go and find my friend,Tara, and we go for a bike ride along the village road or the lane towards Farmington.We ride and play till dinner time.Then we go to our homes and have dinner.In the afternoon we usually play again.Sometimes we go and see my aunt and uncle.They live in Shurdington near Cheltenham.We stay till eight o'clock and then we get in our car and we come home.I sit and watch television with mum and dad.Then I have a drink of coffee and get ready for bed.At nine o'clock I go to bed.
